-0:00:07:I always wanted to leave my country|and go somewhere else.
-0:00:01:I always wanted to come to France.
0:00:01:So, one day when I was 17, I left.
0:00:05:There I was in Paris.
0:00:10:Since I was a bit naive,
0:00:14:everyone seemed beautiful|and fabulous.
0:00:19:I couldn't tell cruelty from kindness.
0:00:23:For me, people were|the way they were.
0:00:28:You just worked with them|or talked with them.
0:00:33:Obviously, it was a big shock.
